official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for optometrists' service and eyeglasses.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide payment for optometrists' services and eyeglasses under the supplementary medical insurance program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for optometrists' service and eyeglasses.
